mapper.select: select post_num, title, content, (select user_id from users where user_num = writer_num) writer_id, (select user_id from users where user_num = modifier_num) modifier_id, write_time, modify_time, visibility from posts where post_num = #{postNum}

select post_num, title, user_id, write_time, (select count(*) from comments C where C.post_num = P.post_num) comment_count, visibility from posts P inner join users on writer_num = user_num where visibility limit 20 offset #{offset};

select post_num, title, user_id, write_time, (select count(*) from comments C where C.post_num = P.post_num) comment_count, visibility from posts P inner join users on writer_num = user_num where !visibility limit 20 offset #{offset};

select P.post_num, title, user_id, write_time, (select count(*) from comments C where C.post_num = P.post_num) comment_count, visibility from posts P inner join users U on writer_num = U.user_num inner join likes L on L.post_num = P.post_num where visibility and L.user_num = #{userNum} limit 20 offset #{offset};
mapper.insert: insert into posts (board_num, writer_num, title, content, write_time) values(1, #{writerNum}, '${title}', '${content}', now());
mapper.update: update posts set title='${title}', content='${content}', modifier_num=#{modifierNum}, modify_time=now() where post_num = #{postNum}
update posts set visibility=#{visibility} where post_num = #{postNum}
